  • Constructor Details

    • LadderAndSnake

      public LadderAndSnake()
      Class constructor

    • LadderAndSnake

      public LadderAndSnake(int numberOfPlayer)
      Class constructor specifying the number of players and creates the 2-D board. Players are assigned names.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayer - the total number of players.

  • Method Details

    • createBoard

      public static void createBoard()
      Creates a 2 D array of game. The board is set in a way such that all the values in the board are zeroes except the locations with snake or ladders.

    • play

      public void play()
      Sets the player turns and then starts the game. The game ends if any of the player reaches 100.

    • decidePlayerTurn

      public static void decidePlayerTurn()
      Decides the player turns as per their dice value. The player will play in the decreasing order of their dice value. The player with higest value gets to play first. The array is created and sorted according to the dice turn.After sorting, the players with same dice values throws the dice again to break the tie.

    • findDuplicates

      public static void findDuplicates(int startIndex, int endIndex)
      Find the duplicates in the player turn array and calls the sort method after finding the duplicates.
      Parameters:
      startIndex - the start index to find duplicates
      endIndex - the end index to find duplicates

    • sortArray

      public static void sortArray(int startIndex, int endIndex)
      Sorts both the arrays of players and player turns in descending order. Sorting of array helps the program to identify which player will play first.
      Parameters:
      startIndex - start index of the array.
      endIndex - end index of the array.

    • flipDice

      public static int flipDice()
      The flipDice() method flips the dice.
      Returns:
      the dice value between 1 and 6 after flipping.

    • playerLocation

      public static void playerLocation(Player player)
      Changes the location of the player after verifying the snake and ladder. If the location exceeds 100 then the number exceeded is subtracted from 100. The location is set to new location if snake or ladder is present.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose location needs to be determined.

    • createPlayers

      public static void createPlayers(int numberOfPlayers)
      Creates the player names according to the player numbers.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - the total number of players.

    • isWinner

      public static boolean isWinner(Player player)
      Checks if the player has reached the final position that is 100. If any player reached 100 then the value returned is true.
      Parameters:
      player - the player which needs to be checked if he is winner
      Returns:
      true if player has rached 100.
